title: Workshop on Instructional Design and Reporting Strategies for Innovating Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical education theory and instructional design experience
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented course aimed at designing instructional methods and establishing reporting systems for medical education innovation

learning_goals: Participants can clearly explain the theoretical foundations of educational strategies
Participants can develop instructional materials applying effective instructional design methodologies
Participants can systematically document resources and implementation plans for educational innovation in a report format
Participants can validate the practicality of educational strategies through peer evaluation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
